compN.comment: Unique part identifier for the certain machine. Nr of the component

compType.comment: The type of part it represents, weigher, bucket, vibration lane, etc. We chose a VARCHAR type because of the dynamic change in components, thus we cannot use ENUM(). Since the impact is rather small of dubble data for now there will no be normalization performed for this field.

activityType.comment: IMPLEMENT ENUM HERE WITH THE AVAILABLE ACTIVITY TYPES.

serviceAgent.comment: The ID of the service agent which performed operations upon the machine's parts.
